game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Forgotten Tomb.
game.description: Archaeologist Dr. Liam has tasked you with recovering the artifact from the Cursed Tomb. Beware of traps and undead guardians. Success awaits!
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a Mystery Scroll

task.description: Follow the map from Dr. Liam to reach the tomb located in the Northern Forest.
Face the traps and defeat the undead to progress deeper into the tomb's interior.
The artifact is likely hidden in a special chamber. Discover it and return to Dr. Liam for your reward.
task.location: Ancient Chamber inside the Forgotten Tomb
